oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of William Preston Graves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Major William Preston Graves (February 1841 - January 20, 1889) in U. S. Army uniform. Graves was a veteran of the Civil War and a career military officer. He was born in Louisville, Kentucky, and died in Little Rock Barracks, Arkansas.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
